scikits.statsmodels.stattools.jarque_bera¶

scikits.statsmodels.stattools.jarque_bera(resids)¶

Calculate residual skewness, kurtosis, and do the JB test for normality

Parameters:

resids : array-like
Returns:

JB, JBpv, skew, kurtosis :

JB = n/6*(S^2 + (K-3)^2/4) :

JBpv is the Chi^2 two-tail probability value :

skew is the measure of skewness :

kurtosis is the measure of kurtosis :

Next topic
